p: Triglycidyl ester of maleopimaric acid is a beige, viscous liquid. It can be prepared from maleopimaric acid, epichlorohydrin and sodium hydroxide according to Scheme 2, followed by filtration, washing and evaporation [ 83]. It can be used in liquid epoxy resins [ 83], non-cytotoxic bio-based epoxypolyurethanes [ 162] as well as synthesis of rosin-based cyclic carbonates [ 132]. Similar liquid resin can be synthesized from fumaropimaric acid [ 122].
